name: Dicejump - A platform game demo
description: Hello! This is my first time to join a game jam like GMTK2022 and made a demo by myself, So the fact is that I don't have much time to create a creative and challenging game. Dice jump is a simple platform game made by ue5, which contains what I have learned so far. I hope you can enjoy it because it is a little bit difficult.  : )
